page.title: 13AGRICULTURAL MACHINERY
page.content: Much farming is now mechanized.Here is a list of farm machinery etc.used in Edale in 1985. 40 tractors,12 mowing machines,12 tedders,23 trailers,4 stock trailers, 1 spreader,12 balers,4 rotavators,12 jugglers,5 forrage harvesters,3 rollers,11 muck spreaders,6 fertilizer drills,6 chain harrows, 1 sheep shearer,1 ditcher,2 spiders, 2 J.C.B.s,4 elevators,2 manure loaders, 1 buck rake,2 big bale spike,1 hay zip, 3 carts,1 chainsaw,3 bale grabs,1 spayer. Some farmers are also agricltural contractors and work for other farmers at times,both in Edale and else-where.
